title: Negative Interest Rates
text:
With rates already low, the FED doesn't have a lot of tools in the toolbox to combat a turn in the economy. Donald Trump and Washington also don't have the skill sets to compliment the FED in making the economy strong again if we do see a turn in the economy. We will just get finger pointing, like we are getting now & massive debt.

The economy will start to go south, and we will see a slow march towards negative rates here in the US....which I think will happen. 2-3% yields to maturities will look good 3 years from now.
description: Interest rates are getting more interesting. So, less interest rates are more interesting. - 19360
